head.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Easily integrate {{FileFormatUp}} file merging into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects with {{ProdFullName}}.

header.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows you to seamlessly merge {{FileFormatUp}} documents within your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive tool for document management. It supports more than 50 formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives, enabling you to merge, split, extract, swap, and remove pages with ease.

more_features.title: Advanced document merging
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is designed to work with over 50 popular file formats, providing robust document processing capabilities.

feature_1.title: Merge various document types
feature_1.content: Effortlessly combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Customize which pages to merge as needed.

feature_2.title: Modify document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange, delete, or swap pages to better structure your business documents.

feature_3.title: Adjust page settings
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and change their orientation between landscape and portrait for supported file formats.

feature_4.title: Extract document pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages, saving them as a new standalone document.

formats.title: Combine multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, ensuring seamless document processing for various business needs.

operations.title: Key functionalities
operations.description: Explore additional features and operations supported by {{ProdShortName}}.

examples.comment_2: Combine the file with another document
examples.comment_3: Save the merged document to a specified location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides seamless merging for {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications by combining multiple files into one.
content.step_1: Set the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_4: Merge the files and save the output document.

code_1.title: Merge selected pages from different file formats
code_1.content: This example shows how to merge {{FileFormatUp}} files while selecting specific pages from other document types.
code_1.comment_2: Set options to include selected pages
code_1.comment_3: Merge the primary file with pages from another document
code_1.comment_4: Save the final merged document to the desired location
